Description of incident: Two laptops were stolen from employees attending an off-site company meeting in January. The laptops contained names and Social Security numbers for employees of Beecher Carlson’s clients, including 1,012 people who live in Massachusetts.UPDATE (8/17/10): The number is closer to 5,432 with an additional 2,824 living in New York, 66 living in Maine and 1,530 living in Maryland.
